data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
In the minute 2, In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nimes.
In the minute 4, Nimes's Zinedine Ferhat misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Nimes are pushing forward but Renaud Ripart's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 8, Montpellier are coming forward and Arnaud Souquet gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Montpellier.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Montpellier.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 11, Benoit Millot signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Nimes's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Nimes.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Important block from the Nimes defence as Gaetan Laborde fires in a strike for Montpellier.
Free kick Montpellier.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Nimes have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Arnaud Souquet (Montpellier) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Nimes to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Nimes.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Nimes.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Benoit Millot signals a Nimes throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Nimes have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Montpellier.
In the minute 29, Montpellier drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 30, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nimes.
Montpellier push forward at Stade de la Mosson and Gaetan Laborde gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Nimes defence.
Benoit Millot awards Montpellier a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in high up the field for Montpellier in Montpellier.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Anthony Briancon for Nimes has been booked by Benoit Millot and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 35, In Montpellier, Teji Savanier of Montpellier is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Montpellier.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Nimes.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 40, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nimes.
In the minute 43, Montpellier's Arnaud Souquet has been booked in Montpellier.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Teji Savanier of Montpellier gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Nimes.
Throw-in Montpellier.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Montpellier to check on Mihailo Ristic, who is grimacing with pain.
Benoit Millot signals a Montpellier throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 52, Mihailo Ristic is back on his feet again.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
In the minute 54, Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 58, Benoit Millot awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montpellier's Andy Delort gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Nimes defender.
In the minute 60, Throw-in Nimes.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 63, Montpellier to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Nolan Roux is replacing Kevin Denkey for Nimes at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
In the minute 65, Andy Delort (Montpellier) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Nimes have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Montpellier's Andy Delort has run offside.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Important block from the Montpellier defence as Renaud Ripart fires in a strike for Nimes.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 70, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 73, Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Mihailo Ristic with Ambroise Oyongo.
Michel Der Zakarian (Montpellier) is making a second substitution, with Florent Mollet replacing Jordan Ferri.
Nimes needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Patrick Burner is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade de la Mosson.
Junior Sambia is on a sub for Arnaud Souquet for Montpellier.
The home team have replaced Damien Le Tallec with Joris Chotard. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
In the minute 83, Nimesâ€™s Patrick Burner is on his feet again at Stade de la Mosson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Renaud Ripart gives Nimes a 0-1 lead in Montpellier.
In the minute 84, Zinedine Ferhat instrumental with a fine assist.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Stephy Mavididi is replacing Pedro Mendes for the home team.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Montpellier.
Throw-in high up the field for Montpellier in Montpellier.
At Stade de la Mosson, Teji Savanier has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Montpellier close to the penalty box.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Benoit Millot awards Nimes a goal kick.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Montpellier.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
